events.message: We have received John Doe's application for the Software Engineer position and logged it in our system.
John Doe's application has been reviewed and correctly categorized under the Engineering cluster based on the software developer role.
Recruiter Sarah has been assigned to handle John Doe's candidacy for the Software Engineer position.
Initial phone screening with John Doe went well, discussing experience with software development and devops practices.
John Doe responded promptly and enthusiastically to the interview invitation, confirming availability next week.
Technical interview for John Doe has been scheduled for May 20th, focusing on coding skills and system design.
John Doe successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in software engineering and devops.
HR interview has been scheduled with John Doe for May 23rd to discuss company culture and benefits.
John Doe completed HR interview positively, showing alignment with company values and team culture.
An official job offer has been proposed to John Doe including salary, benefits, and start date details.
John Doe has provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed strong interest in joining the engineering team.
John Doe formally accepted the job offer to join as a Software Engineer and is eager to start onboarding.
John Doe has started the onboarding process, completing all necessary documentation and initial training modules.
The hiring process for John Doe as Software Engineer has been successfully closed with all necessary formalities completed.
